Charles Charamba (amuru n'abalị iri abụo na asaa nke ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1971) bu onye egwu ozioma nke mba Zimbabwe na onye ozuzu ukochukwu na Apostolic Faith Mission Church of Zimbabwe (AFM)
Ọ malitela ụka ya
Ndekọ Charamba bụ egwu ozi ọma kacha ere na Zimbabwe kemgbe mmalite oge afọ 2000
Ọ gagharịala ma Great Britain na United States, na n'ebe ndịda Africa dum
Otu n'ime egwu Charamba ama ama bụ "Machira Chete"
Nwunye ya, Olivia (née Maseko), bụkwa onye na-abụ abụ ozioma, ma soro ya pụta na ogbo ma na ọba egwu ya; a na-akpọkarị ha “ Ezinụlọ Mbụ nke Oziọma”
Dị ka Chinoitezvi Honor Charles charamba bi na The Surbub nke Gunhill na Harare
Ụmụ ya nwekwara nkà n'ịkụ egwú
A mụrụ Charamba na Mudzi District, nke dị ugbu a na Mashonaland East Province
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Masarakufa na Masarakufa Secondary School na Mudzi, ma mecha ọkwa O-Level ya
N'afo 1998, Charamba malitere ọmụmụ ya na Living Waters Bible College dị na Tynwald, Harare, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor na nkà mmụta okpukpe
ma  mgbe ọ rịgoro na stardom egwu ozioma, ọ laghachiri na mahadum n'afọ 2011 nata "National Certificate in Music" site na Zimbabwe College of Music
N'afọ 2013, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere bachelọ na jazz nakwa na Mahadum Afrịka

N'onwa August nke afọ 2004, Charamba ya na onye ọchụnta ego ya bụ Sebastian Mupa nọ na Agricultural Development Bank of Zimbabwe (Agribank) e boro ebubo aghụghọ n'ịgba ụgwọ mbinye ego $ nde iri anọ  mechara kwụọ $ otu nde
Agbanyeghị, ka emechara nyocha ọzọ, ewepụrụ ebubo ahụ
Egwu ozioma nke Charamba nwere ihe sungura, jazz na jit
Enwere ike ịtọgbọ ya azụ, ma ọ bụ nke doro anya na egwu ọdịnala dịka mbakumba na mhande
Na mbụ, Charamba e dekọrọ  Charamba na Gramma Label
Mana ka o nwetasịrị ego zuru oke, ọ rụrụ ụlọ ihe nkiri nke ya wee malite itinye ọba ya n'okpuru akara nke ya "Ndị na-akụ azụ̀ mmadụ"
ọkpụkpọ òkù nke ndị na-eso ụzọ
Ihe egwu Charamba gụnyere:
